name: Cleave
summary: You swing clear through one foe and into another.
description:
You swing clear through one foe and into another. Make a melee Strike against the second foe.Cleave Leads To...

Great CleaveTraitsRage: You must be raging to use abilities with the rage trait, and they end automatically when you stop raging.
trigger: Your melee Strike kills a creature or knocks it unconscious, and another foe is adjacent to that creature.
